statements: SELECT * FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_name, injury_type FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE update_date = '2021-10-20'
SELECT player_id, player_name, injury_description FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain'
SELECT * FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT player_name, update_date FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE injury_type = 'Fracture'
SELECT player_name, injury_type FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT * FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE injury_type = 'Knee Injury' ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, injury_description FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01' AND update_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT player_name, injury_description FROM InjuryUpdates WHERE injury_type LIKE '%ankle%'
SELECT DISTINCT player_name, injury_type, YEAR(update_date) AS update_year FROM InjuryUpdates ORDER BY update_year ASC
SELECT * FROM Injury_Updates WHERE player_id = 123
SELECT player_id, update_date, description FROM Injury_Updates ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT player_id, injury_type FROM Injury_Updates WHERE injury_type LIKE '%Sprain%'
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS update_count FROM Injury_Updates GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY update_count DESC
SELECT player_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), update_date)) AS avg_days_since_update FROM Injury_Updates GROUP BY player_id
SELECT player_id, update_date, injury_type, description FROM Injury_Updates WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT player_id, update_date, injury_type FROM Injury_Updates WHERE injury_type = 'Muscle Strain' AND update_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_date ASC
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_updates FROM Injury_Updates GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_updates > 2 ORDER BY num_updates DESC

SELECT IH.player_id, diagnosis, treatment, doctor_notes FROM Injury_Updates IU INNER JOIN Medical_History IH ON IU.player_id = IH.player_id WHERE IH.diagnosis LIKE '%fracture%' ORDER BY IH.visit_date DESC

SELECT IU.player_id, IH.visit_date, IH.diagnosis, IU.injury_type, IU.description FROM Injury_Updates IU LEFT JOIN Medical_History IH ON IU.player_id = IH.player_id AND IU.update_date = IH.visit_date WHERE IH.visit_date IS NULL ORDER BY IU.update_date ASC
SELECT player_name, nationality FROM esports_players
SELECT team_name, date_of_birth FROM esports_players WHERE position = 'ADC'
SELECT * FROM medical_histories ORDER BY last_checkup_date DESC
SELECT player_name, team_name, nationality FROM esports_players WHERE nationality = 'USA'
SELECT player_id, update_date, injury_description FROM injury_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth, nationality FROM esports_players WHERE position = 'Jungler';
SELECT player_name, team_name, date_of_birth, nationality FROM esports_players ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, update_date, injury_description FROM injury_updates WHERE player_id = 12345 AND update_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_name, team_name, position FROM esports_players WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY team_name DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, team_name, position, date_of_birth FROM esports_players WHERE position IN ('Mid Laner', 'Top Laner') AND nationality <> 'Korea';
SELECT * FROM player_info;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM player_info WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM player_info ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM team_doctors WHERE team_assigned = 'TeamA';
SELECT * FROM player_info WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM player_info WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM player_info;
SELECT player_name, medical_condition FROM player_info JOIN medical_history ON player_info.player_id = medical_history.player_id;
SELECT DISTINCT team_assigned FROM team_doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EsportsPlayers;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM EsportsPlayers WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM TeamDoctors ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT staff_name, role FROM StaffMembers WHERE staff_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT player_name, position FROM EsportsPlayers WHERE team_name='Cloud9';
SELECT * FROM EsportsPlayers WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM EsportsPlayers WHERE position = 'Jungle';
SELECT player_name, team_name, nationality FROM EsportsPlayers ORDER BY nationality DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, contact_number FROM TeamDoctors WHERE specialization = 'Sports Medicine';
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistories WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
